segments.text: He has come to life in the end .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , thank God . We all felt frightened by the bad new about him .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Fortunately , an ambulance passed in the nick of time , and we got him away to hospital .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right . Unless , who know what will happen .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wish him to be healthy soon .
segments.speaker: S1
